# The average family can not effort a day at the Disney resorts anymore

A family needs at least roughly 700 USD to spend a nice two-day Disney theme park visit. Take a look at the figure below:

![Money spent per income quartile](vacation_buget_Disney.PNG)

Basically the lower 40% of US-society can not afford a two-day visit at Disney. It surpasses their budget by a lot.
